question: Which social media planned to launche the inter-bank money transfer service in India?
explanation: WhatsApp will launch a "full feature" inter-bank money transfer service in India, its biggest market, after a test involving a million users. This uses customers' phone numbers linked to bank accounts to facilitate payments. 4 banks will join United Payments Interface which powers the payments service for WhatsApp. At present ICICI Bank processes the fund transfers on WhatsApp.
